text: Tugay Kaçar (born 1 January 1994) is a Turkish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Boluspor. Tugay is a youth international for Turkey. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Uşak Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Uşakspor footballers Category:Denizlispor footballers Category:Ofspor footballers Category:Osmanlıspor footballers Category:Karşıyaka S.K. footballers Category:Giresunspor footballers
title: Tugay Kaçar
